About Me

Alongkot Sriprom (Net)

BIO

“How It’s Made” was probably one of the best shows I’ve ever watched growing up. I’m always curious about how things are made. Being able to see the process of products being made from start to finish is so satisfying. Today we are relying so much on technology; even my 70 years old grandpa uses an iPhone daily. Technologies are amazing. Just think about it, carrying a smartphone in 2019 means that we don’t have to carry a portable CD player, books, calculator, camera etc. It makes our life so much easier. Being a geek that loves modern technology and always have curiosity for how things work; got my attention to wanting to get into a tech field. In February 2019 I decided to join a coding boot camp at the University of Kansas and it changed my life. I enjoyed every moment learning to become a developer. I still remember how excited I was when I first manage to display “Hello, World!” in HTML to creating a full stack website at the end of the course. It is such a rewarding feeling to be able to bring ideas into a real world application. If you have any question about what I do feel free to contact me. I would love to connect and have a conversation with you.
